definition: root/basis/classifier for long slender objects, e.g. cigarettes, guitar strings/CL:條|条[tiao2]/radical (chemistry)
to eavesdrop/to listen in secret to sb's conversations
erhua variant of 聽牆根|听墙根[ting1 qiang2 gen1]

sentences.english: Southern wall into our courtyard garden.
sentences.chinese: 南牆根成了我們大雜院的菜園子。

sentences.english: Siegfried cringed and shrank against the wall.
sentences.chinese: 西格弗裏德畏縮了，退避到牆根。

sentences.english: The snow had packed against the wall.
The driver just stopped the car at the wall.
sentences.chinese: 司機剛好把車停在牆根下。
